The text is mainly talking about ……….
questionsData.article: More than ninety kinds of fruits, vegetables and seed crops depend on bees for reproduction. The insects gather nectar liquid from flowers. As they do this, pollen sticks to the bees. Pollen is the reproductive material of flowers. As a bee travels from plant to plant, so does the pollen. Bees are producers of natural honey. Honey can be stored, so honey sellers can wait to sell the honey when prices are up. Experts say even (crops 1) that do not require pollination can be increased with the help of bees. The quality of many crops depends on the amount of pollination they receive. Honey bees can be killed by chemical poisons, but they also have a lot of natural enemies. For example, mites (which 2) destroy hives. Tracheal mites are also a big problem; they live in the breathing tubes of bees. Wax moths are insects that eat wax in the hives. Bacterial diseases also affect colonies and can (attack 3) and destroy bees.
